Logical-operators_key3: Logical `operators` are used to combine two or more conditions.
Logical-operators_key8: && is known as AND `operator`.  It checks that two conditions are `true` then it returns `true` otherwise returns `false`
Logical-operators_key11: is known as OR `operator`.  It checks that two conditions and at least 1 condition is `true` it returns `true` otherwise returns `false`
Logical-operators_key14: ! is known as NOT `operator`. It reverses the boolean result of the operand (or condition)
